messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content:
The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader.
MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

messages.title: DEMAND BETTER FOR BRITAIN
messages.content:
Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.
Your name:
Address:
Phone Number:
Return to: Gateshead Liberal Democrats, 76 Saltwell Place, Gateshead, NE8 4QY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for the country.

issues.brexitEurope:
The Conservatives want to force us to go through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
